name: Unlimited Mini Race
description:
In this game you drive a mini car, with different obstacles and skins.

Controls

The controls are very easy to learn. The only thing that you need to know is that you steer with a and d or with touch the left or the right side of the screen.

Shop

That you can pay other Cars or colors in the shop, you need to have screws. Anytime you close the shop and you made a change, you need to press the choose button under the car.

But now have a good time with this game.
